description:
This kit includes essential cleaning products for your bike. Providing everything you need for a thorough bike cleaning, stored in a premium recycled plastic toolbox with a robust aluminum carry handle.

  • 1 Litre LoamFoam
  • 500ml Foaming Degreaser
  • 60ml LinkLube All-Weather
  • Bog Brush
  • Drivetrain Brush
  • Bamboo Bicycle Cleaning Cloth
  • Heavy duty toolbox with removable parts tray
name: Peaty's Cleaning/Lube Kit Tool Box
